caption:
Had a lot of fun with @binance!
Click the link in my stories to watch me compete against @anamxrkovic in a game of foosball.

Don’t miss out as we answer some interesting questions.

🎥 The moment has arrived!
#CR7LEGACY, a fragrance that celebrates my passion, determination, and incredible achievements. 🌟
Now, it’s your turn to create your own legacy.

#CR7 #CR7FRAGRANCES

It’s hard work making it look easy, but it sure is fun! 😃 Check out a behind the scenes preview of our great partner @Cristiano sharing his #Bestmoves with us 💪🏽⚽! Lots more to come. #LiveYourBestLife #ImWithYou

Big news to share with everyone today!
I’m going to be a character in the new fighting game FATAL FURY: City of the Wolves! @fatalfury_pr
Let’s have some fun on April 24th!

#SNK #FatalFury #CR7

#Binance gave me the challenge of taking on @anamxrkovic in a game of foosball, with a twist!

Coming soon 🤝

Proud to support the dreams of a nation hoping to bring a FIFA World Cup to Saudi in 2034 🇸🇦

We’re all #GrowingTogether!

#Saudi2034Bid

Our story… unfiltered!
Follow our journey as it unfolds in the Netflix docuseries, Saudi Pro League: Kickoff, now streaming on Netflix.

#SPLKickoff_Netflix @NetflixMENA

Exciting times for me and my TATEL & TOTÓ family!

From the Middle East to the world, we are thrilled to bring the soul of the Mediterranean to life. With our award-winning TATEL Dubai, TOTÓ Dubai, TOTÓ Abu Dhabi, and La Camera by TOTÓ in Dubai, we continue redefining exceptional dining experiences.

Stay tuned – the best is yet to come!
#TATEL #TOTÓ #LaCameraByTOTÓ

@tatel.dubai @totorestaurantdubai @toto.abudhabi @lacamerabytoto @tatelrestaurants @toto.restaurants

“2034 will be the best World Cup ever!” 💚

Hear from someone who knows about Saudi Arabia. @Cristiano joins the #Saudi34 celebrations by sharing his thoughts on the incredible experience awaiting all fans at the FIFA World Cup 2034™️ 🇸🇦

“2034 ستكون النسخة الأفضل لكأس العالم!” 💚

استمعوا إلى رأي شخص يعرف الكثير عن السعودية؛ @Cristiano ينضم لاحتفالات #السعودية34 ويعبّر عن التجربة الرائعة التي ستنتظر الجماهير في كأس العالم 2034 🇸🇦

#WelcomeToSaudi34
#أهلًا_بالعالم
SIUUU! We’ve launched new videos on our Youtube channels. Go watch!
Pure style 😅 Gio will rate my outfits and you can watch it on Youtube!

Looks like my Padel skills rubbed off on you 😂 Congrats on winning the Premier, @arturocoello__ !

Watch the full video on YouTube - UR Cristiano!
7 questions with @georginagio. 👀 Get ready! Watch the complete video on YouTube!

Today is the day to tell you that this A is AVA.
A new project in which I am putting all my experience as an athlete to help others improve their recovery and increase their performance. Products to take you further.

Visit the link in BIO to discover the products.
#AdvancedRecoveryforAthletes

Got the skills to impress us?⚽️

Join the Binance X CR7 ‘Proof of Skill’ Remix Challenge!

Remix the video and show us your skills!
Only 77 hand-picked winners will be able to proudly say they’ve got what it takes, and one of you will attend a masterclass from the legend himself.

Let’s go!👊🏼
#proofofskill #Binance #CR7
Past, present and future. @rioferdy5 amazing moment, brother. Watch Part 1 on YouTube now!

Celebrating the Year of the Camel in Saudi Arabia! 🐫 When it comes to a healthy choice, my pick is @noug.ksa.

Noug offers exceptional and healthy lactose-free dairy products, making it perfect for a wellness journey! 🥛 🧡
I love it! …. #Ramadan_Kareem

#الصحي_يختار_الصحي

CR Team Pass in @uflgame features a whole range of exclusive items reflecting my path to glory. From bespoke kits to a unique stadium - wanna check them all?

#uflgame

It’s just a little cold 🥶😂

Watch my complete family trip video on UR Cristiano!
Priceless 🥹❤️💚 #PartilhaAPaixão #ShareThePassion

Portugueses,
Hoje começa mais um capítulo da nossa história. Lembro-me com carinho do meu primeiro dia com a seleção, uma jornada repleta de desafios e vitórias. Agora, tenho a honra de estar novamente ao lado de uma equipa de campeões, cheia de talento e determinação. Com a força e o apoio de todos, transformamos sonhos em realidade. Vamos, juntos, lutar por mais um triunfo. Unidos, somos imparáveis.
Força Portugal! 🇵🇹💪 #PartilhaAPaixão

I can’t live without @WHOOP — the wearable that tracks everything from my sleep and recovery, to training and stress. This week, I sat down with the founder and CEO, @WillAhmed, to talk about my data and how it drives me every day to keep pushing to stay in the game. Click the link in my bio to watch the full episode and to join me on WHOOP and unlock your own peak performance.
A present for my family ❤️ Thank you to all the SIUUUbscribers!

Ready for epic @uflgame action? Play for FREE on PS5 or Xbox Series X|S!
Your UFL Ambassador Pack awaits at ufl.link/PlayNow_CR
Claim it and kick off your journey!

#uflgame #play4football #play4legacy

Official Rules apply
@Binance just celebrated the incredible milestone of 7 years, and it’s worth a big SIIIMMM! Here’s to many more successes together as a team. #BinanceTurns7

Greatness is the Goal ⚽️
To stay at the top of your game, it takes knowing your body inside and out. I’ve been wearing @whoop for years to help me perform at my best, finding ways to fine tune my sleep, improve my training, and recover better. I’m excited to officially be a partner of WHOOP — stay tuned for more exciting updates. 👀

.
Home isn’t just a place—it’s a feeling! ✨ @cristiano & @georginagio bring their passion for adventure wherever they go, making every destination unforgettable! 🌊💫
From the beauty of the Red Sea… and now onto the breathtaking Mediterranean gems! 🏝️
The journey is calling,
#YallaCruise and book your escape NOW! 🚢💙
@aroyacruises

المشاعر لا تقاس بالمكان، بل بالذكريات المرتبطة بها ✨
كريستيانو رونالدو وجورجينا، شغوفان بالسفر لكل وجهة، ضمن رحلة استثنائية لا تنسى 🌊💫

من جمال البحر الأحمر إلى أفق جديد نحو روائع البحر الأبيض المتوسط🏝️

لا تفوتوا الفرصة، #يلا_كروز🚢💙
احجز الآن مع أرويا كروز !

IT’S ON! 💥 @erakulis is a project very close to my heart. Born from my desire to promote a balanced and healthy lifestyle for everyone. Now, the tools to care for your body and mind are right at your fingertips! The platform is already available for download.

#Erakulis #BeErakulis #CristianoRonaldo #CR7 #Wellness #Lifestyle #Holistic #Fitness #Nutrition #MentalBalance #Health #HealthyBody #HealthyMind

I dreamed of this, and I have more dreams. Thank you all!
Proud to make history as the first top scorer in 4 countries 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿 🇪🇸 🇮🇹 🇸🇦 A huge thank you to all the clubs, teammates and staff who helped me along the way.

Every achievement tells a story. Every step leaves a legacy.
Celebrating its 10th anniversary, Legacy is being relaunched in a newly designed bottle with a more modern look, reflecting the journey and evolution behind it.
Cristiano Ronaldo Legacy is more than just a fragrance - it’s an inspiration to create your own legacy.

#CR7 #CR7FRAGRANCES #CR7LEGACY
